      • init

        public abstract void init()
                   throws InitializationException
        Initializes the synthesizer. This method will be called once after the synthesizer is constructed and specific parameters are set.
        Throws:
        InitializationException

      • synthesize

        public abstract Transcription synthesize(java.lang.String text,
                                         java.io.File file)
        Synthesizes text and writes the audio to a wav-file
        Parameters:
        text - The text to synthesize
        file - The wav-file to write
        Returns:
        The transcription of the synthesized text

      • transcribe

        public abstract Transcription transcribe(java.lang.String text)
        Transcribes a text
        Parameters:
        text - The text to synthesize
        Returns:
        The transcription of the text if it would be synthesized
